prologue.text: The Chains that bind me have finally become brittle.

post_stage1.text: HAHA! I'm free, im free! Free from that wretched box of a cell! But this place still reeks of confinement.
Though... I'm not exactly free, I'm still in this hellish pit hole of a prison. The walls seem to mock me with their permanence.
I could easily escape however, but... I'm craving chaos. I'll stir up some trouble before I make my grand exit.
(Mizuchi steps out of her cell, the cell that had kept her in for what must have been forever.)
Ahh, fresh air! It's invigorating after that suffocating cell.
One step closer to my destination.
The hakurei Shrine will regret the day they wronged me!
Halt, Spirit! you are about to leave the underworld.
And you are planning to stop me?
Vengeful spirits such as yourself are not allowed to walk the surface.
I see the fire in your eyes still burns bright.
I wish I had a drive like that.
I am going to leave whether you want me or not.

post_stage2.text: Ha! An easy Victory. The first of many.
But I’m not done with you just yet.
Stay away from me! I won't let you--
Don’t worry, I won’t take you out for long.
We just need to follow the flow of the Sanzu river upstream till we reach the surface.
Hey Parsee, why aren't you at your post?
I know you and Yuugi usually hangout at the riverbank, but there's gotta be a point where you gotta focus on work.
Are you perhaps jealous of something or someone?
Ha, you really are an imposter then!
Tch! The jig is up, huh?
You think a Shinigami would not notice a Vengeful Spirit if she sees one?
Now return to your prison at once!

post_stage3.text: You can keep this body here, if you want to feel helpful.
